text: Tumi tomara pratipalakara pathata manuhaka ahbana karaa hikamata arau sadupadesara dbaraa arau sihamtara lagata uttama panthata tarka karaiba. Niscaya tomara raba, teraemi bhaladarae jane kone te'omra pathara paraa bibhraanta haiche, arau kone satpathata paraicalita haiche se'ito'o te'om bhalakai jane
